review_text: Just had our first batch of ice cream from this product. All I can say is "WOW". Easy to use, great end results and fun. My husband couldn't tell the difference between this ice cream and the store bought kinds. I would highly recommend this to anyone for ease of use and cleanup.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
